xxl.core.io.raw

Class NativeRawAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.raw.NativeRawAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RawAccess

    public class NativeRawAccess
extends Object
implements RawAccess
    This is the implementation of RawAccess via JNI an C methods which implement the unbuffered access to files and devices.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long filep
      HANDLE for the device
      long lastSector
      Last accessed sector.
      int mode
      Mode of access (bitwise encoded): Bit 0: flush buffers after each write Bit 1: Try to set hard drive read cache?
      protected long sectors
      Amount of sectors The variable will be set by the native open method
      protected int sectorSize
      Size of a sector

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NativeRawAccess(String filename)
      Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI (with sector size 512 bytes).
      NativeRawAccess(String filename, int sectorSize)
      Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI.
      NativeRawAccess(String filename, int sectorSize, int mode)
      Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Wrapped native close method

      Gets the state of the hard drive cache.

      Returns the amount of blocks of the device

      Returns the size of a sector of the file/device.

      Wrapped native open method.

      Wrapped native read method

      Native method which sets the state of the hard drive cache according to the value.
      String toString()
      Outputs a String representation of the raw device.

    • Field Detail

      • filep

        protected long filep
        HANDLE for the device

      • sectors

        protected long sectors
        Amount of sectors The variable will be set by the native open method

      • sectorSize

        protected int sectorSize
        Size of a sector

      • mode

        public int mode
        Mode of access (bitwise encoded):
        • Bit 0: flush buffers after each write
        • Bit 1: Try to set hard drive read cache?
        • Bit 2: Mode of hard drive read cache
        • Bit 3: Try to set hard drive write cache?
        • Bit 4: Mode of hard drive write cache
        Only used inside native code.

      • lastSector

        public long lastSector
        Last accessed sector. Only used inside native code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NativeRawAccess

        public NativeRawAccess(String filename,
                       int sectorSize,
                       int mode)
                throws RawAccessException
        Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI.
        Parameters:
        filename - of file or device (example: c: or /dev/hda4)
        sectorSize - size of a sector
        mode - mode of access (bitwise encoded). Bit 0: flush buffers after each write
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a spezialized RuntimeException

      • NativeRawAccess

        public NativeRawAccess(String filename,
                       int sectorSize)
                throws RawAccessException
        Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI.
        Parameters:
        filename - of file or device (example: c: or /dev/hda4)
        sectorSize - size of a sector
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a spezialized RuntimeException

      • NativeRawAccess

        public NativeRawAccess(String filename)
                throws RawAccessException
        Constructs a new raw access that uses JNI (with sector size 512 bytes).
        Parameters:
        filename - of file or device (example: c: or /dev/hda4)
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException

      • setHardDriveCacheMode

        public void setHardDriveCacheMode(int cacheState)
                           throws RawAccessException
        Native method which sets the state of the hard drive cache according to the value. It might be impossible to set the state on every hard drive model. To check this, use getHardDriveCacheMode.
        Parameters:
        cacheState - The cache state which is wanted: Bit 0: read cache, Bit 1: write cache.
        Throws:
        RawAccessException

      • getHardDriveCacheMode

        public int getHardDriveCacheMode()
        Gets the state of the hard drive cache.
        Returns:
        The cache state which could be set: Bit 0: read cache, Bit 1: write cache.
        Throws:
        RawAccessException

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Outputs a String representation of the raw device.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A String representation.
